QuestData.Title: Refining The Vision
QuestData.Description: I have finished grinding the stones, and have attuned the hourglass to a new series of timeways. Will you return to the Siege of Orgrimmar and turn the hourglass once more?$b$bReturn quickly, I am most curious.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Vision of Time in the Siege of Orgrimmar.
